title: when will the full screen problem fix?
body:
i press alt + enter and it either goes so close like i cant even see the map, just my champion and sometimes it's ok but i cant zoom bottom and there's a white outline around my game

edit : so i went to a custom game and i can see a bar on top saying "league client tm" or something and on the right i see the minimize button, x button and that other button

replies.body: The Alt+Enter toggles your window from a full screen to windows so you will see the program name and minimize buttons.  I don't have any ETA's just yet, but bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates on this.  Hang tight until this is resolved!
It wont be fixed tbh :/ if it was going to be fixed it should have already been fixed its been more than 3 days

I agree it is quite frustrating that it has taken so long for this issue to be resolved, but your logic behind your argument is quite incorrect. Rather than make an absurd claim, it is more effective to comment on the unprofessional/distasteful nature of Riot's lack of response to a critical issue. This sends the same message that we are frustrated, but better expresses a response that is more compelling.
